interface.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Connection.Interface.Forwarding

signal.name: ForwardingChanged

arg.name: forward_to
arg.tp:docstring: An integer contact handle to forward communication to

signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the forwarding contact handle for this connection has been changed. An zero handle indicates forwarding is disabled.

method.name: GetForwardingHandle

arg.tp:docstring: An integer contact handle to whom incoming communication is forwarded

method.tp:docstring: Returns the current forwarding contact handle, or zero if none is set.

method.name: SetForwardingHandle

arg.name: forward_to
arg.tp:docstring: An integer contact handle to forward incoming communications to

method.tp:docstring: Set a contact handle to forward incoming communications to. A zero handle disables forwarding.

interface.tp:docstring: A connection interface for services which can signal to contacts that they should instead contact a different user ID, effectively forwarding all incoming communication channels to another contact on the service.
